short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use CXera templates to generate one-click customer microsites directly from your Google Calendar™ invites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CXera is revolutionizing the B2B Customer Experience (CX) through Digital Microsites created in one-click from a Google Calendar™ invite. These microsites — or Experience Sites™ — are created in minutes from purpose-built templates such as: 

- Customer Onboarding
- Customer Expansion Proposal 
- Customer QBR and Renewal
- Partner Onboarding
- New Product Launch 
- Webinar Events

What’s the big deal? Personalized microsites provide a secure way to stay connected with customers, giving organizations the ability to: 

Create microsites in a few clicks from purpose-built templates
Engage customers with welcome kits and checklists 
Exchange files in a secure and trackable way 
Understand statuses and be in sync across staff and customer teams
Capture and act on targeted feedback including Net Promoter Score (NPS)
Promote target campaigns like new product releases

CXera for Google makes it possible to create these microsites from Google Calendar™ while leveraging content stored in Google Drive™.
